title: Captain Gangplank
body: Do you have to play a game of the brawler game mode to get the skin or can it be a normal game

replies.body: [You just need to complete a Matchmade game playing as Gangplank before August 10th at 17:00AEST ](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/gangplank-returns-and-event-end-draws-near) - it doesn't have to be in the Black Market Brawlers game mode.

does it matter if we win or lose when playing GP to get the skin?

since i played him yesterday in normal game and lost. I havent got the skin

> [{quoted}](name=RonyStark,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vzPvk7Gc,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2015-08-07T07:28:36.463+0000)
>
> does it matter if we win or lose when playing GP to get the skin?
> 
> since i played him yesterday in normal game and lost. I havent got the skin

"You have to wait until the event finishes before you receive the skin."

What if we played a matchmade co-op game with him last patch before he got disabled? Would that count?
:P

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vzPvk7Gc,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-06T08:40:06.610+0000)
>
> What if we played a matchmade co-op game with him last patch before he got disabled? Would that count?
> :P

Yes.
Eh i still played him tonight anyways.

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vzPvk7Gc,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-06T11:02:46.876+0000)
>
> Eh i still played him tonight anyways.

skins usually take time to be distributed

Up to two weeks from the end of the event is the standard time.
I know :)
Well ive played one of each normal and brawler and dont have the skin, i own every champ in game too

> [{quoted}](name=Scipio,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=vzPvk7Gc,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-08-06T10:29:09.109+0000)
>
> Well ive played one of each normal and brawler and dont have the skin, i own every champ in game too

You have to wait until the event finishes before you receive the skin.
pretty sure it just said play the new GP while the event is on (not the maps, the whole bilgewater rewards story event thing) and then you'll get it.
sooooooooo i do get it with co-op vs ai game?
